column5: Ratio of the document that can contain variable content. A value of 0 specifies a non variable document. A value of 1 specifies a full variable document.
AveragePages SHALL specify the average number of printed pages in each record.
Product/@ID of the product elements that describe individual finishing variants. @ChildRefs SHALL NOT be specified if AssemblingIntent or BindingIntent are specified for this product.

Array of colorant separation identifiers that are required to print the variable part of the documents. The values that are specified in @ColorsUsedBack SHALL also be specified in ColorIntent/SurfaceColor[@Surface="Back"]/ @ColorsUsed.

Array of colorant separation identifiers that are required to print the variable part of the documents. The values that are specified in @ColorsUsedFront SHALL also be specified in ColorIntent/SurfaceColor[@Surface="Front"]/ @ColorsUsed.
@MaxPages SHALL specify the maximum number of printed pages in each record. @MaxPages SHALL NOT be smaller than @AveragePages
@MinPages SHALL specify the minimum number of printed pages in each record. @MinPages SHALL NOT be larger than @AveragePages.
Average number of copies of each record. This value SHALL equal "1" for fully variable data.
@VariableQuality specifies the desired quality of the variable data.
